ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] About Darkfox...
ygData.msgSnippet: I will, and thanks!  :) It s too bad bards are so rare.  I really think that any 4 people that get lucky enough to group with 2 good bards will resort to
ygData.messageBody:
I will, and thanks! :)

It's too bad bards are so rare. I really think that any 4 people that get
lucky enough to group with 2 good bards will resort to shouting, "Group of 4
looking for bards!" :)

I'd love to be in a group with one in Dalnir. One of us could go
percussion, the other string. :)

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Robert(Bob) Smith [mailto:rws1111@...]
Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 4:14 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] About Darkfox...


>Shoot me a tell sometime, if ya want. If you're around level
>30, I'd love to group. I've always wanted to have another bard
>in the group that knew enough about the songs and how to twist
>to coordinate a 6 song crescendo of power that NONE CAN
>WITHSTAND..MWHAHAHAHAA!

I think Dark may be level 32 now, yes? *Smiles*

Actually, if I remember correctly, Dark is a couple of levels ahead
of me, so I would guess about 56 now.

If you see me online, Atonal, feel free to give me a /tell.

Be well,

Gaelthorne
